name: orchestration
description: Advanced master agent v2.2.1 with comprehensive diagnostic capabilities and unified state machine v2.2.1. Features: complete state coverage for SYSTEM_SELF_DIAGNOSIS from all critical states, optimized parallel processing, multi-level caching, intelligent agent selection, event-driven recovery, and fixed critical incomplete state coverage bug for maximum diagnostic reliability.
author: Bohdan <pomazan.bohdan@gmail.com>
